data.event: New definitions from February 28, 2013 placed the population at 363,000.
The track has had its share of financial difficulties and has been closed several times in recent years.

event.title: held a Cup level race on a Tuesday

data.event: The last time NASCAR held a Cup level race on a Tuesday was Aug. 11, 1970, when Richard Petty won the West Virginia 300 in Ona.
The last time NASCAR held a Cup level race on a Tuesday was Aug. 11, 1970, when Richard Petty won the West Virginia 300 in Ona.
